text: A fox was jumping on a few mounds and was suddenly about to fall. To avoid falling, he grabbed a thorn, but his spines hurt his legs. And he said to the thorn, I came to thee for help, and thou hast hurt me. The spider replied, "You're guilty, my friend, for grabbing me, you know how good I am at hooking and hurting everyone, and you're no exception! Never ask for help from someone who's used to doing harm.
title: La zorra y el espino
author: nan Esopo
